record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - December 17, 2007)

[Page: S15782]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that Ben Weingrod and Ryan Kehmma of my staff be granted the privilege of the floor for the duration of the debate on the FISA legislation.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, before my remarks, I ask unanimous consent that Matthew Solomon be granted floor privileges during consideration of the FISA bill. I make this request on behalf of Chairman Leahy.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
